name: untameable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not able to be controlled: The recent forest fires and floods show what a wild, untameable land we live in.
(of an animal) not able to be trained in order to make it less dangerous and more able to live around people: The animals were imported for use as guard dogs but proved to be untameable.
More examplesFewer examplesHer untameable mop of thick sandy hair was growing more unruly every day.We walked alongside the wild and restless, tumultuous, untameable sea.Promoters of the new horseless carriage claimed that the horse was "an untameable brute".
